snippet: To beguile visitors, the International Museum of the Reformation has created inventive and often witty displays that immerse onlookers in the period.
abstract: International Museum of the Reformation, Geneva museum founded in 2005, chronicles history of religious movement that began nearly 500 years ago; plans commemorative exhibition Roads to the Reformation for 2016.
lead_paragraph: To beguile visitors, the International Museum of the Reformation has created inventive and often witty displays that immerse onlookers in the period.

headline.main: Reformation Museum in Geneva Blends Humor and Wonder
headline.print_headline: Butting Heads With Luther at a Remove of 5 Centuries
